title: Service disruption on Bukit Panjang LRT

updates.text: [BPLRT] Fault cleared. Normal train services across BPLRT gradually being restored.  Free regular bus services and bridging bus services available until 1700hrs.
[BPLRT]: No train service between #ChoaChuKang and #Phoenix due to a train fault.  Free bridging bus services available across BPLRT.  Free regular bus services available at affected stations.
